channel.title: Free Graphic Design check diz out!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, im doing some free design since im kinda bored :P Got to go now to soccer training so I will update this thread later. Tell me what you need and I will try to get it look good (:
[B]Fill this in please.[/B] [code] What I want: Banner / Signature / Client Background / Forums Banner / Avatar Text: Subtext: Colors: 3D Text (Cinema 4D): Yes/No Any renders?: Dimensions? (Must be numbers in 0x0 format.): Any Style You Want? (Describe or Give Pictures):[/code]
This isn't my first time doing design for RSPS, but deleted all my work except of some YouTube banners.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zv7sc6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dfdgjo.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2qtx10n.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dy61r5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Free Graphic Design check diz out!
item.dc:creator: @pvm_m0nster pvm m0nster
item.description:
@pvm_m0nster wrote:

What I want: background
Text: Lucas
Colors: i want like the image. but the black background to be an amazing looking color effect
3D Text (Cinema 4D): Yes
Any renders?:if you want to
Dimensions? (Must be numbers in 0x0 format.): 1920 width and 1200 high
Any Style You Want? (Describe or Give Pictures): i would like to be able to read easyer then this image so front on text

Hello there if you could do this i would love you (No Homo)

item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“holylouis, post:18, topic:533455”]what i want: client background
text: Elders of The Fallen
color :if it was possible do some warroirs and mages and rangers fighting and a couple summoning tanks (but if not possible ddo what u think would ffit the best)
3d text(cinema 4d): up to you
any renders :what ever you think will be epic
dimenions: is it possible to get resizable?if not just what you think is best
any sytle you want: just reflerce to color^^^^

you would be a god send if you could do this for me and everyone else …btw plz take all the time you neeed and pm me when ur done …tyvm[/quote]
Post a picture of the client bg you got now, so I know the size + get me an example of what you like
